title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready) with chat, model management, RAG, multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for browsing, pulling and chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js native client (N-API) for Ollama.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express middleware that exposes an OpenAI-compatible chat/completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that talks to Ollama via REST.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama (crates.io: ollama-rs).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that answers channel mentions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies in slash commands.
